actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to extend the authority of the President to authorize emergency purchases of natural gas under section 6 of the Emergency Natural Gas Act of 1977.

summary.text: Amends the Emergency Natural Gas Act of 1977 to extend the authority of the President to authorize emergency purchases of natural gas through August 1, 1978.

titles.title: A bill to extend the authority of the President to authorize emergency purchases of natural gas under section 6 of the Emergency Natural Gas Act of 1977.
